S.FORM: u dadiw atu palaw nu Sakizaya u Sakizaya a dadiw atu palaw sa, piazihan isasa'ay a iga, kyu matineng tu kisu tunu Sakizaya a dadiw atu palaw. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan iga nu Yincumin lalangawan kakitizaan 01 madademecay nu palaw nu Haysin cacudadan mipalaw i puungan nu cidekay salisin nu Haysin cacudadan palaw nu Sakul niyazu' a tatayna taluma' tu kita " "
